name: MDA Space Ltd.
longDescription: MDA Ltd is a developer and manufacturer of advanced technology and services to the burgeoning global space industry. It is an international space mission partner and robotics, satellite systems, and geo-intelligence pioneer. Geographically it serves the United States, Europe, Asia, the Middle East and Others whilst generating key revenue from domestic sales in Canada.
